mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fredericksburg Courthouse, exterior
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Renwick, James, Jr (American architect, 1818-1895) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 1870 alterations include the removal in 1870 of Renwick's raised parapets and steps on the gable ends and, later, the installation of a copper roof with extended eaves, which greatly changed the building's appearance. The tower also received alterations that changed the top and made it less phallic. -- https://sah-archipedia.org/buildings/VA-01-FR6 [work]
